## SafientMain.getClaimStatus property

This function returns the status (0 - Active, 1 - Passed, 2 - Failed or 3 - Refused To Arbitrate) of a claim by it's id

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getClaimStatus: (safeId: string, claimId: number) => Promise<number>;
```
